text: Purple Wave is selling farm equipment in a no-reserve auction ending December 2nd at purplewave.com Name your price today for tractors and tillage implements, a combine and headers, planters and drills, sprayers, heavy trucks, trailers, tools and more. Each asset must sell to the highest bidder regardless of price. Bidding is open now and will close Wednesday, December 2nd beginning at 10 a.m. There's no advantage in waiting, so visit purplewave.com to get started. Purple Wave Auction. Straight, simple, sold.
